title: Vegas Knights
description: It's a kind of magic... When two college freshmen decide to spend Spring Break using their magic to fleece the gambling tables of Las Vegas, little do they imagine that Vegas harbors some magical secrets of its own... And of course what happens in Vegas, stays in Vegas - alive or dead.File Urban Fantasy [The Mob & Magic | Ancient Secrets | Zombie Wizardry | Bet Your Life]
author: Matt Forbeck
